name: Over and Over Again
description:
Traverse through Randomly generated Maze to find and destroy all THREE Runes to open up the exit and escape! 

Controls

 or  to Move Around

to Destroy Rune

Tips

You can check how many Runes are left anytime  with in the first room at anytime!

Orientation will change following the direction of you are going, giving YOU the illusion of going into the same room Over and Over Again!

If Deadend is reached a special sound will be played and you will get teleported to the beginning!

Using A Pencil or Pen to create your own map is highly recommended!

Pre-made assets used

BGM

"Magic Escape Room" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
